articles.author: Derek Robertson
articles.title: The reported Musk-Putin calls revive an unsettling American tradition - POLITICO
articles.description: Tycoons have gotten in trouble for running their own foreign policy before. History has not been kind.
articles.content:
At times the government has been able to rein them in. This time, it might not be possible.
Seasoned diplomats and government watchdogs were aghast at the report of Musks relationship with Putin, es… [+5078 chars]
